coreAttributes.name: Honeyed Bread
coreAttributes.description: A small traditional Egyptian treat; a circular mound of dough with an aroma not unlike honey.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a little bit more comfortable from the sweet taste.

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Pulling the bread from [npc.her] bag, [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] a bite of the circular treat. The taste of honey is dominant in [npc.her] mouth, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(savor)] each bite, moaning as [npc.her] jaws knead and crush the dough. [npc.Her] [npc.tongue+] wrestles with the bread ball created and [npc.she] #IF(npc.getFaceType()==FACE_TYPE_Aurelia_Jackal_face) [npc.verb(start)] reaching for another to keep the taste coming, using [npc.her] canine teeth to tear the bread apart each time. #ELSE [npc.verb(lick)] the bread, the delicious taste bringing out a feel of home cooking. It is not long before [npc.she] [npc.has] finished the bread off entirely. #ENDIF
